thaththa ,amma ,iskole ,katapol eka ...ee hamadeyakma magen aathayi..man wena lokeka jiwath wenawa wage ee kale danune.minuwangoda idala batuwaththata paya eka hamaraka wage durak thibbata mata ee kale danune lankawe kelaware inne kiyala..madhushani kiyala mage wayasema yaluwek hambune oya atharadi hawasata aachchi ,siya gedara aawama podi nangiwa eyala ekka thiyala man loku nangith ekka madhushanige gedara giya eyage poth kiyewuwa.sikuradata thamayi man aasama dawasa edata eyage poth gedara aran enna puluwan..api amaru wachana liwa tharageta,iskole wada kara..ee awurudde agosthu iskole niwaduwa iwara weddi sinhala padam potha deparak withara kiyola iwarakala man.aga higakam saha hith ridim kadulu gana liyala lipiyakata gonu karanna baha eewa liyala sanwedhi hith thiyena oyalata kadulu powannath mata baha.
